origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'MarketResearch.get_market_report', 'description': 'Get the latest market analysis report for a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the industry.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'A detailed report about the industry.'}]}, {'name': 'StockAnalysis.analyze_stock_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of market reports on company stock prices.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'report_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The ID of the market report.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact', 'description': 'An analysis of the impact on stock prices.'}]}, {'name': 'StockMarket.get_real_time_data', 'description': 'Get real-time stock market data for specific companies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'tickers', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of stock ticker symbols.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'Real-time stock market data.'}]}, {'name': 'InvestmentAdvice.provide_advice', 'description': 'Provide investment advice based on market trends.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'trends', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'A summary of the market trends.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'advice', 'description': 'Investment advice based on the trends.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解全球家电市场的趋势。首先，获取最新的全球家电市场分析报告。然后，分析这些报告对家电公司股价的影响。接着，获取当前的美的、海尔和西门子的实时股票市场数据。最后，提供一些关于如何投资家电市场的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的全球家电市场分析报告。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'industry'的值是什么?

prediction: It is not specified in the given information. The value of the parameter 'industry' depends on the specific market research report being requested. You would need to provide a specific industry name in order to receive a market report for that industry.
